  • Constructor Details

    • Platform

      public Platform​(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Constructs a platform for drawing on the game screen
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the platform
      y - the y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the platform
      width - the width of the platform
      height - the height of the platform -- typically constant at 20px
